favourite.article: Praise the Lord for His peace which He gives us. May I bow my knees...
It is wonderful !!!! I love it.

I find, coming to this site and singing a few songs, before I get into prayer and warfare each night at midnight, is such an awesome experience. A very good way to start. Thank You for having this site available.
Can somebody add a video of a group of saints singing this song? please...:)
This is an example of the Prayer of the Age, may we pray such prayer for the accomplishment of God's desire
This song is so sweet. The apostle's prayer in Ephesians is such an experience that we need to strive for daily. Praise the Lord!
